name: Nesseria - s/t LP
description:
Chaos Hardcore in the veins of Converge. 
http://www.myspace.com/nesseria 
Their first album was released on CD by “Trend Kill Records”. DSR and a bunch of other labels will bring it to vinyl.
500 copies on red wax!

"Probably still among the strongest acts out of France right now." - www.poisonfree.com

"Wenn das der Beitrag zur deutsch-französischen Freundschaft sein soll, muss man sich nicht wundern, wenn es bald mal wieder zu natogipfelmäßigen Ausschreitungen im Grenzgebiet kommt." - www.metal.de


Shipping to Germany: 4,00 €
Shipping Everywhere else: 5,00 €

You want to buy something but you aren't able to use PAYPAL?! Write an email [ demonspawnrec@gmx.de ] or message us [ http://www.myspace.com/demonspawnrecords ] for other facilities for payment.

name: Warped Cross - Wherever I May Doom 7"
description:
Motor City Doom Punk with ex-members of SUBVERSION. WARPED CROSS debut 7" is limited to 200 records.(100 on white vinyl, 100 on red vinyl)
This record includes a download code.

Shipping to Germany: 2,50 €
Shipping Everywhere else: 5,00 €

name: Soultrader - Inner Universe 7"
description:
Debut 7" of Germany's SOULTRADER.
90's influenced metallic Hardcore for fans of Downpresser, Mother Of Mercy or Bad Seed.
